title: 2StackStudio
studio-intro-1: 2StackStudio is a hobbyist independent game development studio, run by a couple of UCLA undergrads from Beijing, China. It currently consists of a full stack artist, a full stack developer, a cat, a dog, and two computers. We are game lovers trying to leave a footprint in indie game community.
studio-intro-2: 2StackStudio is focused on creating story rich, narrative driven RPGs with innovative combat and meaningful progression.
